basics.name: Hudson C. Mitchell-Pullman
basics.label: Student Researcher
basics.summary: 16-year-old high school student researching human-AI interaction and CS education at UC San Diego. AI for education builder and researcher. Founder of Henry AI Club.

work.name: UC San Diego CS Education Lab
work.summary: Conducting research on computer science education and the integration of human-AI interaction into learning experiences. Researching AI integration in novice CS education under PhD Student Annapurna Vadaparty and Professor Leo Porter.
highlights: Problem decomposition with input-output pair specification

work.name: Algoverse AI Research Program
work.summary: 12-week AI research program with personalized mentorship from world-class AI researchers.

work.name: SDUSD Student Wellness, Education, and Resources Committee
work.summary: Improving student mental health with AI and student outreach initiatives.

volunteer.summary: Integrating AI literacy and prompt engineering into high school curriculum.
Building a community of student builders and developers.
Designing AI-powered conference management system and expanding conference participation.

highlights: Model UN, VP CS Club, Founder + President AI Club
Advanced college-level single variable calculus and differential equations
